structure.unit: E IMPLEMENTATION OF FEDERAL HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PROGRAMS

text.section: The "SARA Title III Programs Account" is hereby established as a trust and agency account in the State Treasury for the purpose of assisting in the administration and operation of programs authorized by this chapter.
Funds from civil and other penalties, donations, and sources other than fees shall be placed in the account. The account shall not lapse.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 64, effective July 15, 1998.
